response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll not only acquire an extraordinary piece but also enjoy the benefits of our exclusive customer service and support. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
